name: SAIT
text:
Graduating from the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology in Objected Oriented Software Development, I come with a range of experiences from Project Management to Rapid Application Development.

Read the course description here:

name: Practicum
text:
I completed an eight week practicum with H3ALTH TECHNOLOGIES INC. Specializing in DevOps, I worked with a team of developers and used my research skills to bring new and existing technologies to an AWS cloud-based platform.

In addition to technical skills, this gave me hands on experience working on a development team to find creative business solutions.

name: Present
text:
Learning is my ultimate passion.

That's why I continue to teach myself new technologies and practices every day. My most recent self-driven learning path includes, but is not limited to: React, Express JS, Node JS, MongoDB, and Amazon Web Services.
This portfolio, as well as the website in Clients are both made with React.
